comment.author: 22242688@N00
comment._content:
wow, i just looked up the wikipedia article and found out that Oscar Stanage passed away three days before i was born!

unfortunately, he did not pass his baseball talent on to me!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: What a coincidence -- I was born in Ann Arbor (not far from where the Tigers play), within mere weeks of his 60th birthday -- and the blessed event took place only 21 years and some months before he died!
